overview:
System Architect with strong UNIX, Storage and Virtualization knowledge. Particularly interested in: IT infrastructure planning and consolidation, SAN designing and implementation, Virtualization infrastructures. Broad experience with Solaris, Linux and VMware ESX, deep understanding of Hitachi Modular storage architecture and internals, experienced administrator of Brocade equipment, several Sun Cluster deployment planned and implemented.

Currently holding these certifications:

VMware Certified Professional (VCP3 and VCP4) - VCP #10957 VMware Sales Professional in Business Continuity VMware Technical Sales Professional NetApp Certified Data Administrator (NCDA) NetApp Certified Implementation Engineer in SAN (NCIE-SAN) Hitachi Modular certified Storage Integration Specialist Compellent Certified Installation Professional Sun Certified Systems Installer for Sun Cluster Apple Certified System Engineer
